i.name: i
desciption: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit, the center of Snip Snip!, and Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:

q.name: q
q.headerraw:
Snip Snip!


Snip Snip!


	
		
		
	
	


	

	
		CAST TIME:
	
	0.5



	
		COST:
	
	40 mana



	
		COOLDOWN:
	
	6.5 / 5.75 / 5 / 4.25 / 3.5
desciption: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Snippy for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals true damage instead and applies Thousand Cuts.
If Gwen has any Snippy stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.

leveling.name: Center Damage per Snip:
leveling.raw: 9 / 12 / 15 / 18 / 21 (+ 5% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Final Snip Center Damage:
leveling.raw: 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 (+ 25% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Minimum Center Damage:
leveling.raw: 54 / 72 / 90 / 108 / 126 (+ 30% AP) (+ 2% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Maximum Center Damage:
leveling.raw: 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 / 210 (+ 50% AP) (+ 6% (+ 4.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

w.name: w
w.headerraw:
Hallowed Mist


Hallowed Mist


	
		
		
	
	


	

	
		EFFECT RADIUS:
	
	 480



	
		SPEED:
	
	2000



	
		CAST TIME:
	
	none



	
		COST:
	
	60 mana



	
		COOLDOWN:
	
	22 / 21 / 20 / 19 / 18
desciption: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 5 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.
While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is untargetable to all enemies (except turrets and monsters) outside of the mist.
Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.
Gwen negates all attacks by monsters outside of the mist.

e.name: e
e.headerraw:
Skip 'n Slash


Skip 'n Slash


	
		
		
	
	


	

	
		TARGET RANGE:
	
	350 / 450



	
		CAST TIME:
	
	none



	
		COST:
	
	35 Mana



	
		COOLDOWN:
	
	13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9
desciption: Active: Gwen dashes to the target location, and afterwards she gains 10 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit on her basic attacks,  bonus attack speed and  50 bonus attack range for 4 seconds.
Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.
Skip 'n Slash resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of her abilities, and vice versa. Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

r.name: r
r.headerraw:
Needlework


Needlework


	
		
		
	
	


	

	
		RANGE:
	
	 -100 + 1350



	
		WIDTH:
	
	 240 to 0



	
		SPEED:
	
	1800



	
		CAST TIME:
	
	0.25 / 0.5



	
		COST:
	
	100 Mana



	
		COOLDOWN:
	
	100 / 90 / 80
desciption: Active: Gwen can activate Needlework up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals magic damage and slows them for 1.5 seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first slow by a reduced amount.

Within 6 seconds after the first cast, Gwen needs to hit a basic attack, which has an uncancellable windup, or Snip Snip! to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the number of needles launched by 2.

leveling.name: Damage with  Thousand Cuts:
leveling.raw: 30 / 55 / 80 (+ 8% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Total Possible Damage:
leveling.raw: 270 / 495 / 720 (+ 72% AP) (+ 9% (+ 7.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.raw: 30 / 55 / 80 (+ 8% AP) (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Second Cast Total Damage:
leveling.raw: 90 / 165 / 240 (+ 24% AP) (+ 3% (+ 2.4% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

leveling.name: Third Cast Total Damage:
